text: Juan Donoso Cortés, marqués de Valdegamas (May 6 1809; Valle de la Serena (Extremadura) - May 3, 1853) was a Spanish author and diplomatist. ==References== *Catholic Encyclopedia article *Internet Encyclopedia of Philosophy Entry on Cortés Category:1809 births Category:1853 deaths Category:Spanish philosophers Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish writers Category:People from Extremadura
title: Juan Donoso Cortés
